summary: SPEEDOMETER FIRST SHOWED SPEED OF 60 WHEN SITTING STILL.  I TURNED OFF THE ENGINE, RESTARTING IT 3 TIMES AND THE SPEEDOMETER RESET.  BUT A FEW DAYS LATER IT ONCE AGAIN STUCK AND I HAD JUST STARTED IT.  THIS TIME AT 48 AT ALL TIMES WHETHER THE ENGINE IS ON OR OFF, IDLING OF TRAVELING. IT CONTINUES TO BE STUCK AT 48 AT ALL TIMES, NEVER DECREASING OR INCREASING.
